levels.name: Reactive
levels.hero_title: You're flying blind — but you can fix it fast
levels.hero_copy: Right now, analytics is mostly a rear‑view mirror. The upside: foundational fixes deliver the fastest ROI, and you can build momentum quickly.

levels.name: Structured
levels.hero_title: Foundation is there — now close the gaps
levels.hero_copy: You have reporting and some tracking, but it’s not consistent end‑to‑end. Your next step is integration, definitions, and repeatable routines.

levels.name: Systematic
levels.hero_title: Data-aware — time to integrate and optimize
levels.hero_copy: You’re doing many things right, but the system isn’t compounding yet. The opportunity is to unify measurement and turn insights into consistent decisions.

levels.name: Integrated
levels.hero_title: Truly data-driven — push toward compounding gains
levels.hero_copy: Your analytics stack is working across teams. Now the leverage is in automation, higher velocity testing, and tighter decision loops.

levels.name: Compounding
levels.hero_copy: Analytics is a durable advantage. The focus is maintaining quality, scaling personalization safely, and continuously calibrating the growth engine.
